name: Roark Alpinist Woven Shirt - Men's
description: Old school flannel styling made from new school material. The Alpinist woven shirt is more than just another flannel, using a blend of technical polyester yarns and wool, you get modern performance from a classic.Polyester. wool blend has a great warmth to weight ratio.T400 polyester yarns have comfortable mechanical stretch.COOLMAX® helps wick moisture and dry quickly.Snap-down front placket, because buttons feel like a chore.
